Hi all ,

I would like to know if heritrix has some modules or functions to  
support sitemaps[1] and the sitemap protocol[2].
Especially if heritrix is parsing the sitemap location from the robots.txt.
e.g. "Sitemap: <sitemap_location>"

I could not find anything in the source code or documentation about  
that, so I guess hertrix does not support this additional and not  
standard feature.


Has somebody code for this feature and can provide it?


Best
   juergen


[1] http://www.sitemaps.org/
[2] http://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.php#
